name: Monkey.D.Luffy
text: On Play: You may trash 2 cards from your hand: Your opponent chooses a character they own and places it at the bottom of their deck.

effect.text: You may trash 2 cards from your hand: Your opponent chooses a character they own and places it at the bottom of their deck.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and has 'BANDAI MADE IN JAPAN' text, but these are not part of the card's official data. The card ID is P-055, which is consistent with the printed ID in the bottom right corner.
